alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 20 at 12:06AM PST until January 20 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in areas of dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area, Central Willamette Valley and South Willamette Valley. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility varies dramatically across the advisory area. Drivers should slow down and be prepared for sudden changes in visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Pedestrians and cyclists should consider wearing bright or reflective clothing to increase the chance of being seen by others.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; South Willamette Valley
